technologies-changes.title: Technology changes constantly, So do we!
technologies-changes.subtitle: We are a software and app development company keen on pixel perfect solutions that bring your ideas to life!

what-is-cavepot.title: What is CavePot
what-is-cavepot.text1: We are a software and app development company keenz on pixel perfect solutions that bring your ideas to life!
what-is-cavepot.text2: We are curious about the world, that’s why we also call ourselves developers of ideas.
what-is-cavepot.text3: We work hand by hand with our clients, with an open minded attitude towards creativity and innovation, this is the compass that guides us.
what-is-cavepot.message: What's the idea you want to bring to life?

what-do-we-do.title: What do we do?
what-do-we-do.sub-title: We build custom software solutions to help our clients create awesome products

card1.title: I need an app for my business.

card2.title: I need a landing website for my company

card3.title: I need costume software  to improve comunication and conection within my company

card4.title: I need to track my products in real time

how-we-do-it.title: How we do it
how-we-do-it.text1: Every project we work on is like entering a cave. Curious and willing to do our best, we ask ourselves: what amazing things lie underground?
how-we-do-it.text2: Elements of nature create phenomenons when they are together, merging to create something great, such as your needs combined with our skills.
how-we-do-it.text3: Your needs work as a compass for us, in a map that guide us into what we will create, pouring all of that into our pot and finally cooking something great for you.
how-we-do-it.text4: Let us explore your idea, finding the perfect elements for it so we can bring it to life.

technologies-that-we-use.title: Technologies that we use
technologies-that-we-use.text: Over 50 startups trusted us to build their ideas. Want to be the next one?

clients-says.title: This is what our clients say

investigation.title: INVESTIGATION & TRAINING
investigation.text.1: INVESTIGATION & TRAINING esto que nos lleve a cavepot lab Passionate about what we do and willing to learn, we created CavepotLab.
investigation.text.2: We are keen on helping our team members constantly so they can grow technically and professionally. O: so they can grow both technical and professionally

contact.title: How can we help you?
contact.sub-title: Let us know what you are looking foor so that we can help you find it

why-do-we-exist.title: Why do we exist?
why-do-we-exist.text.part.1: We had the intention to create a company that gave us the opportunity to grow as entrepreneurs.
why-do-we-exist.text.part.2: Together we decided to enter the cave -that is now our company- full of passion and uncertainty, willing to find potential elements and transform them into something great.
why-do-we-exist.text.part.3: We digged deep and merged our materials to transform them into what we are now!

name-come-from.title.1: Where does our name come from?
name-come-from.text.part.1: Our name has its origins in our two founders' nicknames- Cuevas, which in spanish means cave, and Olla, which is pot.
name-come-from.text.part.2: Not only our name comes from our two founders' nicknames but also from the idea that, in order to get results, we gotta dig deeper to find the material that works best for you. We consider ourselves a melting pot of knowledge and skills. Every project we work on is like a cave. What amazing things lie underground?

we-wanna.text: We wanna dig deeper, explore the cave, see what lies underground and bring it to life. Come dig with us!

data-history.text: Two students meet at college and   discover a common passion: software development. They are both curious about the world and its challenges, so they easily became friends.
After a few years of working togather they decided to dedicate full time to their dream. This is when CavePot was born.
The company kept on growing and we needed a place to call the office.  We found the perfect place in carrasco cowork.

We became host and sponsor of the Uruguayan Angular Meetup. The cowork, began to feel too tight so we moved. to the place that we call home. Pablo de Maria 1122, the perfect place to set up our headquarters.
We were able to travel abroad, learn about the international market, meet our international clients, and get new ones. This allowed us to grow exponentially.
Clutch Awards the Best B2B Companies in Latin America for 2020.
When we started  we where 2 dreamers.  Now  we are a family of 25, working together sharing a common passion and an unique look towards innovation, creativity and professionalism
data-history.subTitle: Why do we see ourselves as a family?
data-history.text2: We see ourselves as a family, focusing on each one of us' development and professional growth, taking into account the goals and objectives both within the company and each one of us' personal lives.

data-history.text: We keep working on our drem daily.  “Coming together is a beginning. Staying together is progress. Working together is success.'Henry Ford'

projects.title: Take a look ar some of our latets projects
ZANAHORARIO
projects.text: Zanahorario is a time tracking product. Designed specifically for companies internal use. This tool will allow its users to have a neat track of all the hours worked. Moreover they will be able to specify what those hours were invested in.

projects.title: E-CLINICAS
projects.text: eClinicas is a web app developed for UCM (a healthcare company by Falck’s Group). It was created to digitize its patients medical records according to certain governmental requirements and regulations. medical records according to certain governmental requirements and regulations.
